name: Red Baron Clicker
description:
Red  Baron Clicker is a 3D idle clicker game.  You take the controls of an airplane and fly around the world destroying enemy tanks and vehicles! 

Simply click and your plane with Change Directions, randomly.  You also get $1 every time you click!  Buy upgrades, destroy enemies quicker! 

Game features a day / night cycle! 

Created for Clicker Jam Spring 2023 A clicker game with the theme of Changing Directions.
